tool_description: Find Japan Banks & Branch information by Zengin Code. Zengin Codes are used for domestic payment transfers & International Payment Transfer to Japan Bank Accounts.
name: Zengin Code Verification
title: Zengin Code Verification

api_list.name: Zengin Code Verification
api_list.description: Get Japan  Banks and Branch information by Zengin Code. Zengin Codes are Bank & Branch Codes issued to Japan Banks Branches for processing Domestic  Payment Transfers & International Payment Receipts.
